description.value: The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{Combat Expertise} as a bonus feat, even if he doesn’t meet the prerequisites. If he already has Combat Expertise, he instead gains another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Combat Expertise. If the vigilante’s Intelligence score is less than 13, it counts as 13 for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of combat feats.
